sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Paper, TextField, Button, Typography, FormControl, InputLabel, Select, MenuItem, Box, Autocomplete, FormHelperText, Alert, Divider } from '@mui/material'; import { Search as SearchIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'; const ForumBook = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', bookTitle: '', author: '', genre: '', publishYear: '', description: '', discussionTopics: '', category: '' }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const categories = [ "Book Review", "Character Discussion", "Plot Analysis", "Writing Style", "Book Recommendations", "Author Spotlight", "Genre Discussion", "Reading Experience", "Book vs. Movie/TV", "Book Club Selection" ]; const genres = [ "Fiction", "Non-Fiction", "Mystery", "Science Fiction", "Fantasy", "Romance", "Historical Fiction", "Biography", "Self-Help", "Poetry" ]; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!formData.title || !formData.bookTitle || !formData.description) { setError('Please fill in all required fields'); return; } // Handle form submission console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; return (

Create New Book Discussion

Share your thoughts and start a meaningful discussion about books

 {error && ( {error} )}
{/* Discussion Title */}
setFormData({...formData, title: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="Enter a captivating title for your discussion" />
{/* Book Information */}
setFormData({...formData, bookTitle: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="Enter book title" />
setFormData({...formData, author: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="Enter author name" />
{/* Genre and Year */}
setFormData({...formData, publishYear: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="YYYY" min="1000" max={new Date().getFullYear()} />
{/* Discussion Category */}
{/* Description */}
